evidence.claim: The Home Health Team incorporates AWS for cloud services and data storage.
Utilization of EDI and X12 transaction sets for seamless healthcare data exchange.
The platform supports FHIR standards for interoperability in health data management.
Compliance with HIPAA regulations in handling patient data to ensure security and privacy.
Integration patterns feature EDI and FHIR APIs for interoperability with EHRs.

icp.icp_reason: The Home Health Team uses X12 formats and has EDI integrations relevant for healthcare exchange.
